title: Bells
episode_desc: Blackadder develops feelings for a woman posing as his male servant.
show_desc: In the Tudor court of Elizabeth I, Lord Edmund Blackadder strives to win Her Majesty's favour while attempting to avoid a grisly fate should he offend her.
